text: â€œNdipo ndithu tidawapatsa mphamvu (yochitira zinthu ndi kukhala ndi chuma chambiri ndi moyo wautali) zomwe sitidakupatseni inu (Aquraish) ndipo tidawapatsa makutu ndi maso ndi mitima, koma makutu awo ndi maso awo ndi mitima yawo sizidawapindulire chilichonse chifukwa chotsutsa Ayah za Allah; ndipo zidawazinga zomwe adali kuzichitira chipongwe
